name: RC UFO 3D Simulator
description:
Fly over the skies of the city with a UFO, in full 3D, completing mission objectives.
The less time, best score.
Compare your score with pilots around the world through Game Center.

UFO movement is more perfect than in a plane or helicopter, it remains perfectly stationary
when you do not press anything, it accelerates rapidly and reaches high speeds.

The UFO is equipped with machine guns, smart missiles and the incredible ray weapon.
Destroy aircrafts, enemy helicopters, anti-aircraft, ground targets, moving vehicles.
See how they fall in flames when are destroyed by your powerful UFO.

Progress through challenging levels of increasing difficulty.
The first levels you have free camera, in next levels the camera is fixed below the roof of a skyscraper,
which greatly increases the difficulty, but the hardest are the last levels,
in which you must handle the UFO from the jeep in movement.

If there are too many enemies and you have little life, you will have to use evasive tactics to complete the level.

Wide variety of cameras: From the roof, from behind, from behind closer, from within, and from the jeep in movement.
Move between buildings, taking care not to collide with them.
Total freedom of movement around the city, mountains and rural areas.
Recreation of several real buildings.
You can add a banner to the UFO and display the message you want.
Graphics configurable to play fast on all devices.

Challenge: Get land on the roofs of the narrow skyscraper,
and observe the movement of the city at your feet. Only for advanced pilots.
Greatest challenge: Land UFO on a rooftop handling it from another or from the jeep in movement.
